text.div:
PAO Message Event Code System

This is the code system for the value set for the event element in the Message Header

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/dme-orders/CodeSystem/PAO-Message-Event defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
InitialOrder Initial OrderInitial order for Post Acute services
OrderUpdate Order UpdateUpdate to an order (may be declined)
OrderCancel Order CancelCancel an order (may be declined if done)
OrderStatus Order StatusRequest for the status of the order

name: PAOMessageEvent
title: PAO Message Event Code System
description: This is the code system for the value set for the event element in the Message Header

concept.definition: Initial order for Post Acute services
Update to an order (may be declined)
Cancel an order (may be declined if done)
Request for the status of the order
